description: The initiative focuses on raising awareness about food and water wastage, promoting agroecology, and supporting farmers in Morocco and beyond. By diversifying crops and avoiding harmful pesticides, the program aims to enhance food quality and health. It also emphasizes community involvement in agricultural practices, climate adaptation, and income generation through sustainable methods. The foundation seeks to empower local communities, improve living conditions, and foster a network of shared experiences in sustainable agriculture.
name: High Atlas Foundation
